Package com.CMPUT301F22T26.foodegy

Class StorageIngredient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.CMPUT301F22T26.foodegy.StorageIngredient
  • public class StorageIngredient
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for the ingredients the user keeps in their storage. There is a conceptual difference between this and RecipeIngredient. Loosely, StorageIngredient is more specific. Very simple class, only getters and setters

    • Constructor Detail

      • StorageIngredient

        StorageIngredient​(java.lang.String description,
                  java.lang.String bestBeforeDate,
                  java.lang.String location,
                  int amount,
                  java.lang.String measurementUnit,
                  java.lang.String category)
        Initialize an instance of the StorageIntegirent
        Parameters:
        description - the brief description, or name, of the ingredient
        bestBeforeDate - the date, as a String
        location - the location where it is to be stored
        amount - how much of the ingredient there is, as an integer
        measurementUnit - the units in which the ingredient is measured (ml, g, lbs, cans) as a String
        category - the food category that the ingredient belongs to
